analyzed: sani dassana ttika upa ā dinna ttika

original: Anidassanaappaṭighaṁ upādinnupādāniyaṁ dhammaṁ paṭicca naanidassanaappaṭigho naupādinnupādāniyo
analyzed: anidassana appaṭigham upādinnupādāniyam dhammam paṭicca na anidassana appaṭighaḥ na upādinnupādāniyaḥ

original: dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā. (Saṅkhittaṁ.) Hetuyā cha, sahajāte cha …pe… avigate cha.
analyzed: dhammo uppajjati hetu paccayā saṅkhitta hetuyā cha sahajāte cha pe avigate cha
sa nidassana sa paṭighaḥ anupādinnupādāniyaḥ dhammaḥ na sa nidassana sa paṭighassa na anupādinnupādāniyassa

original: dhammassa ārammaṇapaccayena paccayo. (Saṅkhittaṁ.) Ārammaṇe nava, anantare tīṇi …pe…
analyzed: dhammassa ārammaṇa paccayena paccayaḥ saṅkhitta ārammaṇe nava anantare tīṇi pe
upanissaye purejāte nava pe avigate nava
anidassana appaṭigham anupādinna anupādāniyam dhammam paṭicca na anidassana appaṭighaḥ

original: naanupādinnaanupādāniyo dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā. (Saṅkhittaṁ.) Hetuyā cha, adhipatiyā
analyzed: na anupādinna anupādāniyaḥ dhammaḥ uppajjati hetu paccayā saṅkhitta hetuyā cha adhipatiyā
